# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, burners, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to function properly.
- Verify that the electric network is properly configured and that all necessary entities are connected.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient supply of source items to operate.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected to a fluid source.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network.
- Verify that the electric network is properly configured and that all necessary entities are connected.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
